topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/550bb9e763687209299d0500#post_550bb9e763687209299d0500
You only say that because mosquitoes haven't tortured you with sleep deprivation.

One summer a few years ago there were fuckloads of mosquitoes here because of an unusually wet spring. It was too hot to sleep with the window closed, and if i opened the window i would be eaten alive by literally thousands of mosquitoes. Even after i put a mosquito net on the window i _still_ couldn't sleep because of the _sheer noise the thousands of mosquitoes trying to get inside made._
